review: Great Great purchase. Absolutely love it!!!
author: Ricky King

review: I held out and purchased Fire stick once I knew HBO Go was available on the system and was one of the main selling points over Chromecast because I could utilize HBO Go without have to use my phone however upon setting everything up I learned that out of all the major Cable providers Comcast is the one provider that will not allow Fire stick users to utilize HBO Go which was slightly disappointing. If your buying it for HBO GO and have comcast you may be better off with Chromecast.
author: Cameron Saucier

review: Excellent service that the entire family loves!!
